original_text: But on arriving at the jail, the officers did not find them there. So they went back and reported,
korean_text: 부하들이 가서 옥에서 사도들을 보지 못하고 돌아와

sentences.original_text: But on arriving at the jail
the officers did not find them there
sentences.korean_translation: 그 관원들은 그들을 그곳에서 찾지 못했습니다
